WELCOME_TEXT.TITLE: Welcome, {userAlias}!
WELCOME_TEXT.DESCRIPTION:
Hi, I’m Adrijen — a Fullstack Developer with 5+ years of experience crafting modern, intuitive, responsive, and polished web applications. I help companies transform ideas into digital products that make an impact. Feel free to explore my website to learn more about me.
